plot: Documentary exploring human being rights. In Middelfart, Denmark a house has been build where anyone has the right to be heard or seen regardless of their mental state.
title: Herre over eget liv
plot_es: Documentary exploring human being rights. In Middelfart, Denmark a house has been build where anyone has the right to be heard or seen regardless of their mental state.
plot_en: Documentary exploring human being rights. In Middelfart, Denmark a house has been build where anyone has the right to be heard or seen regardless of their mental state.
